title: The Perfect Control of Aphids The Simplest and Easiest Solution by JADAM

tasks.task: Performing tasks related to farming, with subtasks for crop management, pesticide application, and testing.
subtasks: Researching and applying JADAM natural pesticides
Monitoring aphid life cycle and populations
Collecting and testing soft water for pest solution
Preparing and measuring JWD, JHS, and JAS solutions
Applying pest solutions to crops using appropriate equipment
Documenting and evaluating the effectiveness of pest control methods
Comparing JADAM solutions to commercial pest control products
Adhering to safety precautions when handling and applying pesticides
Conducting pre-spray testing and adjusting application ratios
Recording observations and results over time (e.g., via videos, photos)
Adjusting sprayer settings and techniques for optimal coverage

tasks.task: Demonstrating and explaining aphid control using JADAM natural pesticides
subtasks: Describing the life cycle of aphids and their impact on crops
Testing water for use in JADAM solutions (using JWA to check wetting properties)
Preparing the JADAM solution (e.g., 5 liters per 500 liters for prevention, adjusting to 20 liters/500 liters for resistant plants)
Applying the solution (considering plant type and weather conditions)
Comparing JADAM's effectiveness against commercial aphid control products
Documenting results through time-lapse video
Emphasizing safety precautions (e.g., testing on a small scale before full application)
Recommending application methods and equipment (e.g., using a sprayer stick)
Discussing production costs and ecological benefits of JADAM solutions
